```{r}
spam_train=read.table('spam-train.txt',header=F,sep=',')

log_te=log(spam_test[,1:57]+1)
tr_c=spam_train[,58]
te_c=spam_test[,58]

log_te=data.frame(log_te,te_c)
names(log_te)[58]='v58'
names(log_tr)[58]='v58'
```
